languages.text: The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

The wearer gains <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

The wearer gains <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用灵能能力或灵能法杖攻击敌人时，每有一名敌人受到影响，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}都会提高，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}%，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用灵能能力或灵能法杖攻击敌人时，每有一名敌人受到影响，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}都会提高，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>%，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Персонаж получает {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} за каждого противника, к которому применена его психосила или атака посоха. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g}</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} за каждого противника, к которому применена его психосила или атака посоха. Эффект суммируется.

Персонаж получает <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g}</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} за каждого противника, к которому применена его психосила или атака посоха. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで、超能力または異能者の杖による攻撃に対して{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}%分の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を付与。この効果は累積する。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初まで、異能者の杖または超能力による攻撃に対して、<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を</u>%と{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}を付与。この効果は累積する。

languages.text: El portador gana {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} por cada enemigo afectado por sus poderes psíquicos o por su ataque de báculo. Es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: El portador gana <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} por cada enemigo afectado por sus poderes psíquicos o por su ataque de báculo. Es acumulativo.

languages.text: Der Träger erhält bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} für jeden von seiner Psioniker-Kraft oder seinem Psionikerstab-Angriff betroffenen Feind {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} für jeden von seiner Psioniker-Kraft oder seinem Psionikerstabangriff betroffenen Feind. Addiert sich.

languages.text: L'utilisateur bénéficie de {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'au début de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} pour chaque ennemi auquel il inflige des dégâts à l'aide de ses pouvoirs psychiques ou de son bâton de psyker. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur bénéficie de <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant pour chaque ennemi auquel il inflige des dégâts à l'aide de ses pouvoirs psychiques ou de son bâton de psyker. Cumulable.

languages.text: The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, kullandığı ruhsezi gücü veya ruhsezer asası saldırısından etkilenen her düşman için bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcına kadar %{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri kazanır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.
